author: brian
msg: Rearranges the ordering of the optional modules, and provides somewhat clearer
explanations as to the functionality of each module.

author: brian
msg: 1) brings back complete URL's in Location: headers
2) makes the default "base" into the URI for the mapfile
3) pointinrect() now can take any two opposing corners in
4) closes potential for an infinite loop in mod_imap.c
5) if a mapfile isn't found, returns NOT_FOUND instead of SERVER_ERROR.

author: mjc
msg: Make the message about server version strings get noticed

author: mjc
msg: The HTTP specification says that it is legal to merge duplicate
headers into one.  Some browsers that support Cookies don't like
merged headers and prefer that each Set-Cookie header is sent
separately.  Lets humour those browsers for now.
